resources.string: Location permissions denied, please enable the permissions to use this app.
WARNING!!!\nIf you leave this page, the current session will be lost! \nYou will need to request a technician (if any) again!
WARNING!!!\nIf you proceed, all your previous information will be overwritten! \nPlease choose accordingly.
WARNING!!!\nIf you go back, all of your unsaved modification will be discarded!
WARNING!!!\nIf session is ended, order is complete and final. Do you want to proceed?
